name: A Little Time
description:
It's late October, 1935. A cold day in London. A man enters your office, distraught. His brother has been missing for a week, and no one seems to know where he is. Take the role of John Marshall McClaney, a young private investigator striking out on his own after his dismissal from the police force. Explore a variety of environments and search for clues. Piece together information and connect the dots of the case to find the missing brother and uncover the larger mystery behind his disappearance.

Travel through the streets, alleys, and buildings of London as you explore a variety of scenes. Pick up clues and follow the story of a detective determined to find the answer. As you explore, you will find and interact with many different clues and objects to gather information that you can use to solve the case.
